attributes.action: Stop the destruction of historic Harlington village by third runway at Heathrow
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Harlington village is rapidly become a wasteland as residents leave like rats leaving sinking ship due to threatend third runway. The picturesque village which is mentioned in the doomsday book should be saved at all cost

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/londonheathrow/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
